article.title: The Rise of Female Heroes in the Marvel Cinematic Universe
article.article: Over the years, the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) has witnessed a significant transformation, particularly in terms of representation and diversity. One notable aspect of this evolution is the rise of female heroes who have taken center stage in various films. Gone are the days when female characters played supporting roles; now, they are powerful, complex, and pivotal to the MCU's narrative.... [Full article content here]

In which film did Black Widow make the ultimate sacrifice during the events of "Avengers: Endgame"?

In the MCU, who is known for being the former spy and skilled fighter?
How does the Disney+ series "WandaVision" contribute to a deeper exploration of Wanda Maximoff's character?
